explanation: [0-0] A man in red is sitting at a table with a large pizza on it. A waiter stands beside him, ready to slice the pizza. The background behind them is dark gray with some patterns on it.
[0-2] The man in red stops the waiter from slicing the pizza and proceeds to roll it up himself.
[0-2] The man in red stops the waiter from slicing the pizza and proceeds to roll it up himself.

[2-8] The scene then switches to another man in white with a different pizza. This pizza is a classic Italian Margherita. Another person in a gray jacket, standing next to him, attempts to cut the pizza but is stopped by the man in white. The man in white then starts to roll up the pizza. Suddenly, a hand reaches out from the front of the screen and slaps the man in white. The man in white recoils in pain.
